title: Afcon 2025: Senegal 1-0 Egypt
description: Sadio Mane scores the winner for Senegal to end Mohamed Salah's hopes of winning his first continental title with Egypt in the Afcon 2025 semi-finals.
content:
Sadio Mane scored the winner as Senegal beat Egypt to reach the final of the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) - and end Mohamed Salah's hopes of winning his first continental title in Morocco.
Mane struck the only goal of a cagey contest with 12 mi... [888 chars]

title: UK borrowing costs drop to lowest level in more than a year
description: Greater scope for interest rate cuts and reduced fears about government finances prompt bond yields to fall
content:
UK borrowing costs have dropped to their lowest level in more than a year, as investors were encouraged by more stable government finances and the prospect of further interest rate cuts.
The yield, or interest rate, on 10-year UK government bonds fel... [2186 chars]

title: Finance secretary corrects Budget after missing out A96 plans
description: Fergus Ewing said a commitment to dual the entire route was missing from a key Budget document.
content:
The finance secretary has committed to fully dualling the A96 after the route was missing from a Scottish government Budget document.
Shona Robison said the A96 Inverness to Aberdeen corridor should have been included in the Infrastructure Delivery P... [799 chars]

title: Government asks Ofwat to review South East Water's licence as thousands still without supplies
description: About 17,000 properties in Kent and Sussex are still being affected by South East Water problems.
content:

title: Starlink reportedly made free in Iran - but protesters are taking huge risks by using it
description: The satellite technology has become a vital communications lifeline after the government shut down the internet last week.
content: Starlink has reportedly waived monthly subscription payments for users inside Iran after its government shut down the internet last Thursday - cutting off millions of people from their families, livelihoods and access to information, during a deadly ... [4786 chars]
